price: (Azabwirwa ati) “Soma igitabo cyawe! Uyu munsi wowe ubwawe urihagije kwibera umubaruzi.”
arabic: ٱقۡرَأۡ كِتَٰبَكَ كَفَىٰ بِنَفۡسِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ عَلَيۡكَ حَسِيبٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: iq'ra kitābaka kafā binafsika al-yawma ʿalayka ḥasīban
